reviewText: Very sexy and sultry. Quite titillating.

Nude & Naughty is fifty-eight minutes long and was released in 2002. The video starts off with beautiful nude females by the pool side. Then nineteen minutes later we are out in the desert nude with the exception of a three minute scene where she is barely topless. After that, for the next fifteen long minutes the clothes are kept on. There is one scene where we see a lady in a two piece bikini and in another scene there is a blonde wearing a dress and foundling herself. It is only during the last twelve minutes do we get back to the ladies being nude. If it was nude for the whole 58 minutes, I would have given it a five star rating. Also when were they naughty? There is no difference between the VHS version and DVD version. Also the only model mention in the DVD is the cover model Michele Berry. Nude & Naughty only gets a B.
